product_title: Alexa Paperbag Waist Crop Wide Leg Jeans
product_description: A braided belt plays up the retro vibes of cropped stretch-denim jeans designed with a high paperbag waist.
product_details_and_care:
A braided belt plays up the retro vibes of cropped stretch-denim jeans designed with a high paperbag waist.
26 1/2" inseam; 19" leg opening; 10 3/4" front rise
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
Removable belt
98% cotton, 2% elastane
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
